attributes.action: encourage the promotion of THE REAL GOD, THE LORD JESUS CHRIST in our society, among ALL BRITISH  RESIDENTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir THE WORD OF GOD handed down to us through GOD'S DEALING'S with the Jewish people is THE TRUTH OF GOD.
We must protect our people from all FALSE TEACHINGS, NO MATTER HOW FANATICLE others may present their IMAGINED "gods". For the most part Satan, and man's refusel to be obedient to GOD ARE THE REASON FOR all the false "gods" that people try to impose on society!
THE BIBLE IS GOD'S WORD. THE LORD JESUS CHRIST IS GOD OUR REDEEMER, SAVIOUR. The only hope of a world SEPERATED FROM GOD BY MAN'S DOING HIS OWN THING.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
